Sandy's Sand Corp
Released 10 January 2006 (Update)
Founder Sandy
Current leader Sandy
Headquarters Sandy's Sand Corp, Brimhaven
Locations Mainland and Zanaris
Products Sand pits
Location
Sandy's Sand Corp headquarters.

Sandy's Sand Corp is a sand supplier[1] which owns many sand pits found on Gielinor, as well as the sand pit in Zanaris. The organisation is based in Brimhaven and is managed by Sandy.[1] Employees work on rotas and are paid 50 coins every week, typically working 9 hour shifts.[2] Their jobs including transporting sand from Karamja to top up their designated sand pits.[1]

Contents

  • 1 The Hand in the Sand
  • 2 Members
  • 3 Trivia
  • 4 References

The Hand in the Sand[edit | edit source]

Sandy had come into contact with Clarence, a wizard from the Wizards' Guild and student of Zavistic Rarve.[3] He tasked Clarence with the creation of a spell which would make Bert believe anything he said, and in return offered to pay Clarence for this service.[4] Sandy then changed Bert's rota,[5] and left the scroll behind in Bert's house, intending to make Bert work longer without paying him more.[6] Unwilling to pay Clarence, Sandy murdered him and hid his remains in various sand pits.[7] Eventually Bert uncovers a hand in the sand pit and enlists the player's help, starting The Hand in the Sand quest.

Members[edit | edit source]

  • Sandy - The owner and founder of the corp, currently missing.
  • Bert - A worker based in Yanille.
  • Mazion - A worker based on Entrana.
  • Blaec - A worker based in Zanaris. (presumably)
  • Reeso - A worker based in Rellekka. (presumably)

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The sand pits found in Dorgesh-Kaan and Prifddinas have no owners.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ 1.0 1.1 1.2 Bert, "The Hand in the Sand", Old School RuneScape. "Sand! Lots o' sand! Me boss be Sandy o' Sandy's Sand Corp based in Brimhaven on the isle of Karamja an' I hauls sand fr' there to yon sand pit."
  2. ↑ Sandy's rota, "The Hand in the Sand", Old School RuneScape. "9am-6pm"
  3. ↑ Zavistic Rarve, "The Hand in the Sand", Old School RuneScape. "Oh my! This is most definitely Clarence, my most able student!"
  4. ↑ Sandy, "The Hand in the Sand", Old School RuneScape. "[Why doesn't Bert remember the change in his hours?] Because.... because.... I bribed a wizard to put a spell on him so he would believe everything I say!!"
  5. ↑ Sandy, "The Hand in the Sand", Old School RuneScape. "[Why is Bert's rota different from the original?] Because... I changed it."
  6. ↑ Sandy, "The Hand in the Sand", Old School RuneScape. "So that I could make him work longer without paying him more!"
  7. ↑ Sandy, "The Hand in the Sand", Old School RuneScape. "[What happened to the wizard?] I...I... I KILLED HIM! So I wouldn't have to pay him and no one would know. I put his body in the next load of sand."
